00024 class StopFilter: public Analyzer {
00025 protected:
00026         UString::EncodingType encodingType_; 
00027         set<UString> stopDic_; 
00028 public:
00029         StopFilter(const set<UString> dic, UString::EncodingType etype = UString::UTF_8)
00030         :encodingType_(etype)
00031         {
00032                 stopDic_ = dic;
00033         }
00034         StopFilter(string file, UString::EncodingType etype = UString::UTF_8)
00035         :encodingType_(etype)
00036         {
00037                 ifstream ifs(file.c_str());
00038                 char buff[200000];
00039                 while( !ifs.eof() ){
00040                         ifs.getline( buff, 200000 );
00041                         UString str(buff, encodingType_);
00042                         if(!str.empty())
00043                                 stopDic_.insert(str);
00044                 }
00045                 ifs.close();
00046         }
00047         ~StopFilter(){};
00048 
00049         bool analyze(const TermList&, TermList&);
00050         bool analyze(TermList&);
00051 };
00052 
00053 }

00055 #endif /* STOPANALYZER_H_ */
